mapper.select: select c.PROGRAM_NAME ,d.GENRE ,b.TALENT_ID ,b.TALENT_NAME from T_ONAIR_KANRI a inner join M_TALENT b on a.TALENT_ID = b.TALENT_ID inner join M_PROGRAM c on a.PROGRAM_ID = c.PROGRAM_ID inner join M_KBN_GENRE d on d.GENRE_ID ='1' and c.GENRE_ID = d.JYUNJYO where a.PROGRAM_ID =#{programId} and a.ONAIR_DAY =#{onairDay} and a.DELETE_FLG = '0' and b.DELETE_FLG = '0' and c.DELETE_FLG = '0' and d.DELETE_FLG = '0'
